articles.title: Greetings to Equatorial Guinean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Equatorial Guinean President
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday congratulated Obiang Nguema Mbasogo on his reelection as president of the Republic of Equatorial Guinea.
					 In his congratulatory message Kim said he was pleased with the great advance made by the Equatorial Guinean people in the struggle for the country's socio-economic development and progress under the leadership of the president.
					
					 Expressing belief that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished the Equatorial Guinean president bigger successes in his work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Congratulatory Group of General Association of Koreans in China Here
articles.content:
Congratulatory Group of General Association of Koreans in China Here
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China for celebrating the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Vice-Chairman Cha Sang Bo arrived here Sunday.

articles.title: Koreans in China Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Koreans in China Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China for celebrating the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Sunday.
					 Members of the congratulatory group laid bouquets before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Pu Yong Uk, chairman of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, Sunday visited Mangyongdae, birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Members of the group toured the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum which houses historical materials and relics associated with revolutionary activities of the President and his family members in Mangyongdae.
					
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary career of the President, they went round the historical relics preserved at the old home with much care.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks May Day
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks May Day
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill Sunday to mark the 126th May Day.
					 Present there were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Yang Hyong Sop, officials of working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and other officials and people in the city. 
					
					 Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, made a report.
					
					 Upon the authorization of Marshal Kim Jong Un the premier congratulated the working people across the country on May Day.
					
					 The glorious history of the Korean revolution is shining as the proud years in which the working people have successfully discharged their noble mission and duty in the work to carry out the cause of the Juche revolution and socialism under the guidance of the great leaders, the reporter noted, and went on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, who embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years, put forward broad strata of popular masses including the workers, peasants and intellectuals as the masters of not only their destiny but the revolution under the banner of the Juche idea and ushered in the Juche era, a new era of history in which the independence of the masses was achieved by enlisting their inexhaustible might.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il closely rallied the working class and other masses around the party and wisely led to victory them in their cause of independence and socialism by dint of single-minded unity.
					
					 The history of the great leaders' sacred revolutionary guidance is given steady continuity by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Working people exist in any part of the world but none of them are leading such a worthwhile and proud life as the working people in the DPRK demonstrating the independent dignity as human beings under the care of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 The working people should turn out as one in the drive to step up production and construction and bring earlier the final victory in the confrontation with the U.S., each taking a rifle in one hand and a hammer or sickle or writing brush in the other with the will to annihilate the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet group running amuck with reckless nuclear war drills against the DPRK to have the sun of Songun, which represents the life and destiny and bright future of all Koreans, eclipsed.
					
					 The Korean working people will as ever boost the solidarity with the working people all over the world in their struggle to oppose exploitation and oppression by capital and achieve genuine democratic right and social progress and will fulfill their mission before history to achieve prosperity common to humankind in the idea of independence, peace and friendship.

articles.title: Senior Party, State Officials Join Workers in Marking May Day
articles.content:
Senior Party, State Officials Join Workers in Marking May Day
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials joined working people in various parts of the country in marking May Day.
					 Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior officials of the party and power bodies visited the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex, the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill, the State Academy of Sciences, construction site of the stockbreeding base in the Sepho area, the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, the Unhung Co-op Farm in Thaechon County and other institutions, industrial establishments, construction sites and farms to congratulate the workers, agricultural workers and intellectuals on the holiday.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, pictures showing their beaming images and mosaics depicting them and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Leading officials of the party and state and those in different parts of the country met and encouraged innovators.
					
					 They joined working people in such diverse sports and amusement games as tug of war and enjoyed art performances.
					
					 They requested all the working people to fully display the spirit and mettle of working people of Songun Korea in bringing earlier the final victory of the great Paektusan nation.

articles.title: Working People Observe May Day
articles.content:
Working People Observe May Day
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- All people across the country significantly celebrated May Day.
					 Art performances were given by national art troupes at theatres, parks and pleasure parks of Pyongyang.
					
					 A concert was given by the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre.
					
					 Drama "Woman Comrade of Mt. Paektu" was given at the National Theatrical Theatre.
					
					 A performance was given by the National Folk Art Troupe at the Ponghwa Art Theatre.
					
					 Revolutionary opera "Victory of the Revolution Is in Sight" was given by the Phibada Opera Troupe at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
					
					 Acrobatics and jugglery pieces were staged by the National Circus.
					
					 Art troupes of the North Hamgyong and North and South Hwanghae provinces and other places performed at theatres, halls and outdoor stages.

articles.title: Haeju Baby Home and Orphanage Inaugurated
articles.content:
Haeju Baby Home and Orphanage Inaugurated
 Haeju, May 1 (KCNA) -- Haeju Baby Home and Orphanage were successfully built and inaugurated with due ceremony on Sunday.
					 The baby home and orphanage are fully equipped with all amenities and environment necessary for nursing and educating children including nursing and education rooms, dining rooms, combined fun-fairs, rooms for intelligence games, barbers' and treatment rooms.
					
					 Officials of the province and city, children of the baby home and orphanage, employees, shock brigade members and working people in Haeju City attended the ceremony.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, the children entered their cradles of love.

articles.title: DPRK Players Prove Successful at 2016 Asian Weightlifting Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Players Prove Successful at 2016 Asian Weightlifting Championship
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- DPRK players proved successful at the 2016 Asian Weightlifting Championship.
					 The championships that held in Tashkent, Uzbekistan from April 23 to 30 brought together more than 260 men and women players from over 30 countries and regions including the DPRK, Vietnam and Thailand.
					
					 Kim Kuk Hyang came first in the jerk and second in snatch in women's weightlifting over 75 kg category events, thus placing first in the total standings with two gold and one silver medals.
					
					 Ryang Chun Hwa came first in jerk and second in total standings in the women's weightlifting 48 kg category events with one gold and one silver medals.

articles.title: Newspapers Observe May Day
articles.content:
Newspapers Observe May Day
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers Sunday editorially mark the 126th May Day.
					 Rodong Sinmun says the working people of the DPRK have performed shining feats for the party and leader, the country and revolution under the wise guidance of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il built the Workers' Party of Korea into the party of the working people and mass party both in name and reality and led the revolution and construction to victory by arousing broad strata of workers, farmers and intellectuals.  .
					
					 It was Kim Il Sung who embraced once maltreated and oppressed workers, farmers and intellectuals and let them give play to their patriotic enthusiasm and creative ingenuity, thus building a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence in a short historic period. And it was Kim Jong Il who trained all working people as genuine revolutionaries remaining boundlessly loyal to the idea and cause of the leader.
					
					 The great leaders visited factories, co-op fields and scientific research institutes across the country and bestowed upon the ordinary working people the high honor of being models and heroes of the times. Such loving care and profound trust shown by them are brilliantly recorded in the history of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The course covered by the working people of Juche Korea who have demonstrated only victories and glory, holding the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu in high esteem, proves the immutable truth that the great leader and the great party train the great people and no force on earth can bar the great Korean people from advancing to achieve prosperity of the country in the indomitable revolutionary spirit and with strong will and burning patriotism.
					
					 Minju Joson says no force on earth can block the Korean people advancing toward the final victory, united close around Marshal Kim Jong Un. It calls for giving fullest play to the heroic stamina of the Korean working people by creating the new Mallima speed in building a thriving nation under the leadership of the party.

articles.title: Minju Joson Urges U.S. to Seriously Heed DPRK's Warning
articles.content:
Minju Joson Urges U.S. to Seriously Heed DPRK's Warning
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The Western world is very stunned by the DPRK's entry into the flight test of submarine-launched ballistic rocket in less than a year since the announcement of its underwater test-fire in May last year, saying in unison this proves that the DPRK's warning to turn the U.S. mainland into debris is not just joke.
					 Minju Joson Sunday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 As the world recognizes, the DPRK is not making a joke to the U.S. but is fighting a crucial battle to protect the sovereignty, vital rights and dignity of the country.
					
					 The DPRK has advised more than once the U.S. to drop its anachronistic hostile policy toward the former and co-exist with it in a peaceful way.
					
					 But the U.S. has persisted in its policy for standoff of force, always pursuing the scenario to stifle the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					 The U.S. is now compelled to read the face of the DPRK in carrying out its policy of confrontation with the DPRK and dares not provoke it.
					
					 The U.S. had better seriously heed the DPRK's warning that its mainland may turn into debris due to the latter's nuclear strike and would be well advised to behave politely before it.

articles.title: Certificates of Exploits to Peerlessly Great Men of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Certificates of Exploits to Peerlessly Great Men of Mt. Paektu
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un were awarded the certificates of exploits from the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with due ceremony in Dakha on April 26.
					 Its participants laid a floral basket before the art piece depicting Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The certificates were handed to the DPRK ambassador to Bangladesh by the chairman of the institute.

articles.title: Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Posted by UK Body on Its Website
articles.content:
Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Posted by UK Body on Its Website
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "On the Occasion of Founding the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army" and leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Thoroughly Establishing the System of Party Leadership" were posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on its website on April 22.

articles.title: Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Studied, Disseminated in Italy, Mexico
articles.content:
Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Studied, Disseminated in Italy, Mexico
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- There took place reading sessions on the works of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the Milano Center for the Study of the Juche Idea of Italy and the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on April 16 and 22.
					 Before reading Kim Il Sung's work "For the Implementation of the Judicial Policy of Our Party" the chief of the Milano Center praised Kim Il Sung for leading the Korean revolution to victory and glory.
					
					 Speakers at the reading session renewed their resolution to conduct more brisk study and dissemination of the works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and solidarity activities for supporting the just cause of the Korean people.
					
					 The chairman of the Mexican Committee read out Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Organizes and Guides All the Victories of Our People" before explaining in detail the exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in the party building and leadership and the proud course covered by the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Korean Film Shows Held in Different Countries
articles.content:
Korean Film Shows Held in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Korean film shows took place in Ethiopia, Nigeria and Indonesia from April 7 to 18 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Korean films "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un", "The Tower of the Juche Idea", "Kimilsungia, Flower of Sun" and "Reply of Korea" were shown.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed by Foreign Organizations
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Foreign organizations and institution posted write-ups on their websites on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea posted articles on its website on April 12 and 15, illustrated with a photo of the President and art work depicting him.
					
					 An article titled "Exploits President Kim Il Sung performed for cause of human independence" said the President achieved the cause of liberating Korea, setting a fine example for the national liberation struggle in colonies, encouraging the world oppressed people and fully supporting many countries and people in their struggle for independence against imperialism.
					
					 Kim Jong Il Library in Ecuador on April 14 in an article titled "Sunny smile" said the President fought an arduous anti-Japanese armed struggle to liberate the country and founded the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK, the first people's democratic state in the East.
					
					 The article noted that the President beat back the invasion by the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, and built the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on the same day posted an article which praised the exploits of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who demonstrates the might of Juche Korea.

articles.title: Russian Websites Observe Day of Sun
articles.content:
Russian Websites Observe Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Write-ups were posted on the Russian websites on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of Sun) and in the run-up to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 An article titled "Kim Il Sung, eternal sun" was posted on Irkutskblogspot. Ru on April 12, illustrated with the portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 The article cited the facts that the prominent figures of many countries praised the President as a model of internationalists, great teacher and incarnation of benevolent politics, saying that the President is still alive in the hearts of all people.
					
					 An article posted on Patrioti Moskva on April 15 introduced the International Kim Il Sung Prize and the International Kim Jong Il Prize with the photos of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Internet news agency Erofei-Deve on April 11 said in an article titled "Peerlessly great man Kim Il Sung" that he was a pioneer and leader of the era of independence, elder statesman who guided the cause of human independence and peerless sage who was admired by all people for his noble humanity and virtues.
					
					 An article titled "Self-development of the DPRK" posted on Amur Pres on the same day noted that the Korean people glorified the hard years of the revolution with victory by dint of self-development based on the Juche idea and brought about eye-opening achievements in the spirit of self-development and self-reliance, the engine for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Russian Media Introduce Korean People
articles.content:
Russian Media Introduce Korean People
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Russian media reported special programs with the photos showing the revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un in the run-up to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Newspaper Rio Panorama on April 20 carried an article titled "Principle of giving priority to self-development", which said the Korean people turned out as one in the struggle to bring about bigger success in the revolution and construction on their own efforts, upholding the slogan "Let us usher in a golden age in building a thriving nation in this year when the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea is to be held!"
					
					 The article noted the self-reliance based on the undying Juche idea was a precious tradition of the DPRK.
					
					 Newspaper Byvor on April 22 carried an article titled "Setting it as primary goal to meet independent demand of people".
					
					 The article said:
					
					 The 70 year-long history of the WPK is the one in which it has struggled after setting it as its primary goal to meet the independent demand of the people, taking motherly care of their destiny.
					
					 The WPK is called the mother party by the people who entirely entrust their destiny and future upon the party and wholeheartedly trust it as it keeps Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as its guidelines and works, regarding it as the supreme principle of its activities to serve the people.
					
					 Online news agency Vlad News on April 22 said that the Korean people achieved many successes in the fields of economy and national defence under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The media edited at least 100 photos introducing the DPRK in which a series of changes are being made under his leadership.

articles.title: Bulgarian Newspaper Blames U.S. and S. Korean Authorities for Tension on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Bulgarian Newspaper Blames U.S. and S. Korean Authorities for Tension on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean authorities are wholly to blame for the grave tension prevailing on the Korean peninsula.
					 The April issue of the Bulgarian newspaper Iskra said this.
					
					 The article went on:
					
					 Tension on the peninsula is escalating due to the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises.
					
					 The joint military exercises are aimed to invade the DPRK.
					
					 This saber-rattling is taking place every year.
					
					 The world is well aware that the DPRK is bolstering up the national defence capability for self-defense.
					
					 The Korean People's Army is keeping itself in full combat readiness to cope with the reckless war games of the U.S. and south Korean authorities.
					
					 This is because nobody can vouch that these military exercises will not spill over into a real reckless war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that even a single spark on the peninsula can trigger off a disastrous war and this may escalate into a world war.
